report.title: Not so Methy Lone
report.author: Tiger Faerie
report.bodytext: It was a rainy day /n I had a headache /n /n This /n I have to say makes for an interesting tale of facets, of euphoria, of wellbeing and of love. /n /n I had commitments last night, I had promised a friend that I would go to his gallery opening I had also however just received a curiousity, the methylone. /n I was never really one for social event such as gallery openings /n For those who dont know, it generally an ordeal for those who dont enjoy small talk, wine and large groups of insecure people gathered in one space. /n However this night I decided I would try the methylone /n I hadnt eaten anything for a number of hours so had pretty much an empty stomach. /n I dont have scales /n So I worked old school /n Dividing the yellowy powder with a card, /n Tipping it into a glass of water /n A little stir /n It tastes slightly bitter /n But not unpleasant /n The time now is about 7.10pm /n I am on the phone to my friend with whom I will join later /n I tell him that I am drinking this stuff /n I finish the phone call /n I feel clearer /n Its now 7.20 /n my headache has pretty much gone /n it normally take me a while to get out the house /n but I was on the bus by 7.30 /n and the bus journey was nice /n I felt great /n And clear headed /n With no feelings of paranoia /n I didnt worry about the other people on the bus /n I am listening to music, it sounds good, but it is good. A DJ set from Berlin. It just enhances my good mood. Im tapping my feet a little but I dont feel like I want to burst into dance! /n I get there and there at about 8pm /n I felt as free as a bird /n I flitted around talking to many people, those I knew, those I didnt. /n I felt as though I was full of positive confidence, the kind which is not full of ego. /n Everyone is drinking, I dont want to drink. I dont really like it anyway. /n I have nice conversations, very caring. Conversations flow easily with everybody, even those that I dont like. Again there is no paranoia which I might feel on E or mdma. My mind is clear. I am able for the rest of the night to deal with all kinds of social situations which I may have otherwise found challenging. /n I clocked my friend /n Lets call him MP /n Of course as many faceted as the world is I could not just go up and speak to him. /n Oh no for tonight, in this setting anyway, we were to play a little game. /n For no one was to know that we really knew eachother yes, its true artists are a bunch of no good scoundrels! /n Exchanging glances every so often, I began to feel that enhanced sex drive similar to mdma but with out the confusion. /n I floated around looking at the artwork /n I didnt feel the forced need to mingle /n It came very naturally /n I was very comfortable in the space. /n Speaking is easy, with only one notable minor drug sounding,slur! /n An hour went by /n 9pm ish /n I felt the need to smoke more than usual, as I dont smoke cigarettes much anymore /n But, as with many drugs /n I enjoyed heart felt conversations with friends. /n Eventually after much circulating /n We decided it was time to leave MP and I /n We went out separate ways /n Meeting at the bus stop /n Yes! /n Now it was time to go to the circus! /n Yes, literally. /n We happen to live in a city which once a year, for one month only, experiences its population more than double, and this toy town comes to life with music, cabaret, theatre, dance etc. /n Approaching 10pm /n We kiss /n It feels great /n Well it always feels great /n But the methylone in my brain and the previous situation of sexual tension makes this kiss explosive. /n We go to a bar /n I am totally loved up /n Again not like mdma really, you see I dont like mdma too much as it makes me feel a bit confused and paranoid, its like on mdma my feelings are not true. They are just chemical. /n With Methylone I felt I could let my guard down completely, and let the drug take its course. I see now why its sometimes called Ease. /n I ask MP if he would like to join me down pleasant street /n We order juice and tonic water /n I dose his drink with about the same amount as me /n It is 10.20pm /n I am still flying /n I feel fantastic /n Again within 10 minutes MP has joined me /n And we cant keep our hands of one another /n Small rushes of euphoria come in waves, remaining just at the right level to remain tucked within the inner self. /n We talk about how we feel /n Truly and honestly /n And its beautiful /n There is no false e-talk here /n 10.50 we head off to the circus /n it is still raining heavily /n and when we get there the que is long /n we continue kissing under our umbrella /n needless to say we are both very much hedonists! /n The que isnt too bad, I decide to drop a very small about of acid. /n Small as I dont want to override the methylone first time round, small also because we are going to the circus, and really there isnt need to enhance the experience too much! /n The acid came on quickly. Although at this small dose gave me that slight headache and feeling in the top of the mouth sensation. /n The performance was great, twas Le Clique in fact /n I love that sort of thing anyway, I really enjoy this time of year here, as people like MP and I are always this way, and for this month many others come into town, other performers and new friends. I feel really happy in this new environment /n I am even starting to get a little full of myself /n I begin playing up to the circus/cabaret vibe, I am also wearing my soviet generals outfit one of them. This is normal for me though! /n We both enjoy the acts /n MP I can tell is feeling that increased sex drive I mentioned earlier /n We go out at half time /n And enjoy cigarettes and dirty dancing in the rain. /n When we leave the circus it is about 2am /n The rain looked beautiful on the ground /n We wished we could go home /n But in our situation this was no possible /n We had to eventually go our separate ways /n However horny we were! /n A taxi home /n A kiss goodnight /n /n I am home /n It is nearly 3am /n I go into my room /n I think im tripping /n As to my surprise I see a shape in my bed /n There is someone asleep in there! /n I deal with the situation /n Its one of the lost boys of never EVER land /n I am surprised at my cool ability to deal with the situation /n He is promptly evicted /n /n I decide to have a joint /n Unexpected OEVs! /n Controlable though, nothing too heavy. /n I shut my eyes /n In a bid to hope that sleep will come /n I hear the sounds of rain outside becoming distorted /n Intense CEVs! /n Woah /n I had no idea! /n These CEVs were where I saw the really synergy between the acid and the methylone /n They had the slight dark side of acid, with similar colours. However the bliss was there which carried me through nicely into dreams of utopia with MP. /n /n In all this was a very pleasant experience /n Better than I had expected /n There is only one thing I worry about /n And that is, I would be tempted to use this chemical more often for events such as openings and the like. /n /n I awoke early /n Typically feeling as though I never slept /n I feel great though /n A little tierd /n But full of positive energy /n /n I hope MP feels this good
